name: TRF - The Race Factory (OUYA Edition)
description:
WHAT IS TRF (OUYA EDITION)?

TRF - OUYA Edition is a port of The Race Factory to the OUYA console for the 2020 Winter Ouya Jam. It is a free version of the game, with some features removed to make it run on the OUYA.

The AI does less calculations and therefore is quite a bit slower than the equivalent AI on PC. So you may find the game a little easy.

FEATURES OF THE OUYA EDITION:
  • 8 Vehicle Classes (Street, Sports, Super, Hyper, Karts, Formula, Trucks, Boats)
  • 16 Tracks (4 are removed compared to PC Edition due to performance issues.)
  • 3 Battle Arenas
  • 9 Game Modes (Race, Elimination, Drift, Zen, Infection, Pass The Bomb, Hold The Gold, King of the Hill, Return the Flag)
  • 1-4 Player local multiplayer
  • Event settings such as weapons, drafting, catch-up etc. can be changed.
  • Use in-game coins to buy cosmetic changes for your vehicles.
CONTROLS:
  • O - Fire Weapon, Confirm Button
  • Y - Reset Car
  • RT - Accelerate
  • LT - Brake
  • RB - Pause
  • LB - Toggle Player Names
  • L3 - Toggle Headlights
  • Left Stick / Left/Right D-Pad - Steer

Tested Controllers: OUYA Controller & Wired Xbox 360 Controller.

Known Issues:
  • Sometimes buttons can't be clicked in the menu on an OUYA controller.
  • AI gets stuck on Ocean Battle Arena.
  • Poor Performance in battle modes.
  • Poor Performance in split-screen.
  • If multiple controllers are connected to the OUYA, they should join as a player, or else the cursor may not be able to be moved.
